name: Mwendano logical game for Android
description:
We introduce this puzzle called mwendano (MW) for Android. The game was only available for PC, J2ME and Web but now you can play directly in your Android smartphone offline.  It is the game that can be played by anyone but best for great thinker like you.

Now, what is mwendano game?

This is the logical puzzle that is about to move all rings to the required targets (circles) with matching colours.   Only rings can move, also rings with same colour move together but they can move only if they are two or more movable rings. You just select single ring and then you click adjacent room that has no another ring of any colour. Note, you cannot move rings diagonally. You can read full extra information about this game in PDF from  http://bit.ly/2Sg3fmR  that is game guide eBook for PC version but concepts is the same for any platform.

Also you can read more on game itself, just click menu button from bottom right of the game interface then choose "View game help".  Game play progress is auto-saved if you quit program properly using Back button or Off soft button found on options key on top-right of game interface.

This android version contains all features available on PC version like sound effects, tutorial etc. This game requires at least Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) or newer. If you have older Android phone than that, try using J2ME loader to play with J2ME version. Please leave comments if you have any suggestion or opinion about this game.
